medical_history.chief_complaint: Fixed dilated pupils discovered during a neonatal ophthalmic examination.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms were identified during a neonatal examination; the patient was able to fix and follow an object with both eyes. There are no specific details regarding the exact onset, duration, or progression of the symptoms provided.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had patent ductus arteriosus and ventricular septal defect surgically repaired before the age of 1 year, and she has a developmental delay due to a history of severe bronchopulmonary dysplasia.
